title: Randomly, after close and launch again, SQL database is truncate (empty)
author: lastuptodate
body_snippet:
I used mRemonteNG since 6 months and this is the 3nd time that this problem occured: mRemonteNg SQL database is completely truncated (empty)

## Current Behavior
This problem is rare and random. I think that this occured when mRemonteNg  was closed and opened again fastly but not sure

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
